Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text:
Very comfy place for us take our breakfast near out hotel. We ordered the green smoothie with spinach and Avocado, homemade applepie, lemonpie and chocolate croissant. Everything was delicious at very reasonable prices!
Very kind stuff! I hope we'll be able to come again!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Really really cute coffee shop to enjoy some nice time, vintage style interior, good coffee, various cake choices, very nice slagroom truffel.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Nice cosy cafe, latte was very decent, and staff even added Oatly at no charge when I asked for it a bit after I paid! Great service.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Most important thing is that it opens at 7 o'clock. The coffe is good. It serves different cakes. It is very interesting that there is a big table where you stay near to different people who read newspaper on real paper

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: This is a great place to get a fantastic coffee and do some work in and cosy vibe! Definitely worth a visit. Many locals here. You can also get great croissants ü•ê

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Nice coffee place with delicious cakes and very good coffee. The top floor is a good place to hangout.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Cozy cafe with lots of seating over two floors. Rather quiet, with some pleasant jazz music playing in the background. Large communal wooden tables and vintage-y chairs make for a nice atmosohere. Visited in the morning and the staff was ‚Ä¶

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Too bad we couldn't sit and enjoy our coffee because it is such a nice and wonderful place.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text:
Oh glory days, where art thou?
Wandering into this good ol‚Äô coffee haven, expecting to have at least a decent coffee. 1 sip later, disappointment is written all over my face. What happened? ‚Ä¶

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Tasty coffee and nice seating inside - could have some more individual tables, but generally recommendable for caffeine fix and snacking

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: The place where gangsters get their coffee!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: This is beautiful coffee place and nice barista, good coffee

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Very good and friendly staff

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee and, oh boy, the coconut macaroon is just perfection. Only visited during lockdown for now, will hold final judgement till a proper sit down visit, but I am feeling good about this place.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee, friendly staff and nice decor with sufficient space unlike a lot of places. Personally I found the clientele a bit too "I'm busy with social media and an online marketing presentation" types but to each his/her own.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Very nice staff! And the banana bread is delicious!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Highly recommended. In this cafeteria I had the best cappuccino in ages. In my view they confidently master the art of coffee making. Don't forget to try the freshly baked pastel de nata. A great addition to your espresso or cappuccio. Give it a try!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Well balanced roast and truly dedicated baristas make for some of the best coffee in Amsterdam. The cinnamon croissant is very good, not too sweet and always fresh and flaky. They have all newspapers at the reading table which is a perfect ‚Ä¶

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: one of the fav places in Amsterdam

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Coffee excellently made! Although a bit too roadted for my personal taste, this place deserves congratulations for the preparation process. A high quality, hand actuated press delivers coffee silently! Nice decor also.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Found this friendly coffee shop on our visit to Amsterdam. Delicious flaky pastries and great coffee. Servers were nice and efficient. Other customers were friendly, too. Made it our daily routine.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great place to grab coffee when trying to get accustomed to the time zone change. Service was pretty quick in my experience. Drinks are not large by US standards, but they are really well made. I enjoyed my latte.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Cosy coffee location with great coffee and delicious apple pie!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Still think the best espresso in town, and for sure the most constent one. Always same quality. They have more nice sweets to go with your coffee. Love these places.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Superb coffee and homemade cake. Small cafe with nice employees. Had an excellent cappucino and the homemsde carrot cake and apple cake were a dream. Thanks for a great coffee break with the family!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: A great place to get a coffee in this part of Amsterdam. The ambience of the Coffee Salon is great. There are many newspapers that can also be read. It‚Äôs a nice spot to visit to read or chat with friends. The cookies and waffles are also spectacular

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: What a place! Great coffee (perfectly toasted) and superb cappuccino. The place is super cool and the cakes are amazing! U must try the Apple Tart, with fresh cream of course...

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Expect absolutely no service whatsoever. Was told off when I asked the counter staff to help me bring the coffee to the table because my hands tremble and I wanted to avoid a mess. It's a 2m distance from the counter to the table and yes, ‚Ä¶

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text:
Very good coffee and a large seating area.

But... surly staff - I was greeted by "do you know what you want?" ‚Ä¶

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Open early, 7 Am. That is earlier than most other coff6 bars in Amsterdam. Their coffee is really good. Lovely cappuccino.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee and pastries.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee but the new cash register sytem sucks. Took months to upgrade and the time it now takes to order is a nuisance for the staff and for the customers.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Selection of English newspapers and magazines. Quiet atmoshpere, good coffee and sweets.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Delicious coffee and homemade iced tea in a calm atmosphere. The communal tables with outlets are perfect to work in the afternoon!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee. Lovely staff. Amazing atmosphere... What else is there to say

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Loved this place. Coffee is good, if a bit expensive. Relaxed athmosphere. Not the most beautiful furniture, style of sixties, but still nice.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: 4 years ago I had my last Cinnamon Croissant and haven't found any elsewhere ever. Do you still sell them?

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Delicious apple pie and coffee. Totally recommend for a cozy coffee break in Amsterdam

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Normally a great place with good coffee, pastries and friendly staff. I guess today those staff members were off and the other kind was on duty...

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Good coffee and bakery. High prices, but is the center of Amsterdam, it's normal. A good place to have a coffee with friends or colleagues.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: They do not allow laptops or tablets in the weekends. Rude staff and very high prices for standard coffees.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Good coffee great atmosphere, excellent yogurt and granola and croissants, friendly staff

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Ok, so their coffee isn't so good, sadly. But I love the location (lovely street), atmosphere and their sweets!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Best coffee in the area of Utrechtsestraat. It is somewhat expensive, but hey! Aren't all good products in live.... Beats Starbucks and Cofffee Company by miles

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: If you like Dutch style aromatic coffee

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great quality coffee and pastries. Specially reserved lap top free space where you can sit back and relax.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Mediocre espresso for a high price

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee and service.  The baristas are well trained and even speciality are made to a high standard!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Maybe the best Italian espresso I've tried in Amsterdam so far. Quiet place with nice atmosphere and kind service.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: The coffee is the real Italian espresso, the quality is high so prices are also above the average.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text:
The service was fast and the cappuccino was delicious.
I ordered to go but the inside of the place is quite picturesque!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Best crispy stroopwaffles. Ice tea was great too. Good atmosphere for studying.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Tasty pastries and solid coffee! Lots of great newspapers to browse and a diverse clientele.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: I lked their coffee. The staff was helpful and friendly. The place have a chilled modern vibe as well

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: This coffee shop have great coffee, great atmosphere. The pie is so delicious.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Good quality coffee in a nice and cosy atmosphere. Great for catching up with friends.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Nice place, good coffee, but no wifi and not very attentive stuff

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Nice staff and seating area. Great iced coffee latte and chai latte

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Very nice place but they insist on not having wifi there. Also often the food they carry is not available, e.g. kaneel croissants.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Good coffee, friendly service that doesn't reach beyond the counter, though.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Lovely caf√©, good coffee and friendly staff

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Coffee was all right. Service and price was not. Also being mocked when I asked the coffee was a no no. Did they understand I was italian? Avoid it.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Brilliant coffee and apple cake

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Fancy coffee shop, good service.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee good service

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee, great cakes. Great service.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: West is much better! Quality of coffee is low. Team absolutely is unfriendly here.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Cozy and relaxing spot. Great selection of coffee and cakes.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Delicious coffee and hazelnut chocolate croissants!  Came here every morning we were here.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Super cozy little spot with a large communal table in the back. Cute upstairs lounging area.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Nice coffee house to meet friends and have a refreshment especially in the cold winter time.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: An absolute no go, arrogant and incompetent staff, absolutely revolting. In all my life, I haven't experienced such a rude service!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Took 40 minutes to get coffee because they forgot the order twice. And the coffee was pretty bad. Avoid.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great coffee, awesome service!

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Good coffee, nice and original atmosphere inside

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Great place. Best waffles with honey we saw in the city.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Terrible service very rude no manners not even a friendly smile does not deserve a rating

Review Text: Quality coffe, small place a bit noisy. Opens all weekdays.

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Good coffee, great atmosphere

Review Text: a quaint, inviting atmosphere with friendly staff and great espresso

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: Best espresso I've had so far in Amsterdam.

Review Text: Good coffee and very tasty cakes.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) I just paid 8 euros for an Americano (this is a regular coffee) and a Latte. There wasn't even a cookie. I understand the hospitality industry is struggling but these prices are wmb outrageous. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Quality of the coffee varies too much with the baristas. Sometimes good coffee, but today (not for the first time) the coffee flushed. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Koffie Salon
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Good coffee, and delicious cakes and tarts to go with it. Also a great place to relax for a while. Always busy and prices are a bit on the high side. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Good cappuccino, could be a little warmer. Very tasty artisan apple pie. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Koffie Salon

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice interior. Staff not very attentive and even a biscuit couldn't get rid of it with the coffee ... ‚Ä¶
